page.title: 21Oatcakes
page.content:
This article is factually incorrect. The oatcakes referred to are Staffordshire Oatcakes and originate in the Potteries - Stoke-on-Trent - where oatcake shops are widespread. An oatcake shop in High Lane, Burslem is renowned and supplies oatcakes over the internet to ex-pat Potters throughout the UK. Customers include some famous ex-pat Potters such as Robbie Williams the singer. What Sheffield has to do with Staffordshire Oatcakes I cannot imagine. It may be a local delicacy of Leek but is imported from the Potteries.
Philip Clarke
